abstract: Amers in Germany get mail held by Brit 8 to 10 wks; speculate on future seizure of mail on U S ships
snippet: At 4:30 A.M. last Tuesday the tele-- phone rang in the White House. Ambassador Bullitt was calling from Paris. He wanted to tell President Roosevelt that King Leopold had surrendered his army of Belgians....
lead_paragraph: At 4:30 A.M. last Tuesday the tele-- phone rang in the White House. Ambassador Bullitt was calling from Paris. He wanted to tell President Roosevelt that King Leopold had surrendered his army of Belgians.
